title: Eluvietie - Live At Metalcamp  mp3  320k   ak6103
description:
Eluvietie - Live At Metalcamp  mp3  320k   ak6103 What we got...Live at Metalcamp is the first live album by Folk Metal Swiss Eluveitie . The album was released in November 2008 under the label Nuclear Blast Records .

Note that the album art is very similar to that of the studio album Slania . Indeed, we find the same mountainous background, and the same woman armed with a sword, only his posture changes.

    Andro ....................Biography

Formed in 2002 by Chrigel Glanzmann , Eluveitie was originally a project studio exclusively. The idea is to mix metal and Celtic music .

Following the release of their EP VÃƒÂªn in October 2003 , Chrigel decided to make Eluveitie a real band and recruited new musicians (some of whom had participated in VÃƒÂªn). They signed in 2004 a contract with Fear Dark Records , which distributes their new album, Spirit . In 2008, Eluveitie signed to Nuclear Blast and sort (on 15 February 2008 ) his second album, Slania .

The song Inis Mona meets a great success and contributes to the group's popularity grow. It is the song of the group the most viewed on Youtube.

Live at Metalcamp is their first live album: it contains the songs from their first two albums and their EP

Mid- July 2008 , the twins Rafi and Sevan leave the band for personal reasons, they are now replaced by Pade Kistler and Kay Brem.

On 17 April 2009 released the third studio album named Eluveitie Evocation I - The Arcane Dominion , an entirely acoustic album Omnos is their second single..

Eluveitie returns to the metal in 2010 with the release on 19 February 's Everything Remains As It Never Was , their fourth studio album. Gallic songs are less present, and the group again based more on English.

The band's fifth album, Helvetios , an album that attempts to recreate the conquest of Gaul in terms of Helvetian, was released February 10, 2012 .

The group plans today the release of two new albums, one with accents and other metals with strong accents like Celtic Evocation I - The Arcane Dominion , according to the revelations of Chrigel Glanzmann .
